QuestData.Title: Khazaduum, First of His Name
QuestData.Description: The Argunite Matrix that powered this part of Eredath was shattered by a hulking beast. We had never seen another like him.$b$bHe was called Khazaduum and he was a most faithful servant of the Legion. He volunteered to undergo an experimental transformation to become the first of his kind. His arrival was the end of this battle.$b$bAs a prize he took the Argunite Keystone from the shattered matrix. Take it back and we can finally end this bloodshed.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Khazaduum was the first to undergo a horrific transformation, granting him strength unlike any known to the Eredar at the time.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve the Argunite Keystone from the Echo of Khazaduum.
QuestData.CompletionText: Please, they should not be made to suffer any longer.
QuestData.RewardText: I cannot right every wrong that happened here, but this is a comfort nonetheless.$b$bThank you, $n.
